definitions.text: the cognitive condition of someone who understands
examples: he has virtually no understanding of social cause and effect

definitions.text: the statement (oral or written) of an exchange of promises
examples: they had an agreement that they would not interfere in each other's business
there was an understanding between management and the workers

definitions.text: an inclination to support or be loyal to or to agree with an opinion
examples: his sympathies were always with the underdog
I knew I could count on his understanding

definitions.text: the capacity for rational thought or inference or discrimination
examples: we are told that man is endowed with reason and capable of distinguishing good from evil

definitions.text: know and comprehend the nature or meaning of
examples: She did not understand her husband
I just can't see your point
Does she realize how important this decision is?
I understand you have no previous experience?
You don't need to explain--I understand!

definitions.text: characterized by understanding based on comprehension and discernment and empathy
